name: Rosco's Vile Food Competition
description:
Your mission is to travel around the many mysterious areas in Rosco's lair in order to find the grossest food/drink item to win the competition that Rosco is holding. Depending on how gross the item is, you can either win or get rejected! There are numerous nasty food items scattered across your adventure. However, there are only two items that are qualified to win the competition, so after you think you have found it, find Rosco the Bear and show him what you got! There is an option to save the game in one of the rooms use J to interact with all things. Good luck with the maze! :)

Controls: 

use J to interact with objects/items

use UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT to move around
